title: Review Employee Expense Report for Policy Violations
description: A compliance officer is reviewing an employee's expense report for any violations of company policy.

tasks.description: Retrieve the employee's submitted expense report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the specified expense report.

tasks.description: Automatically scan the report for common policy violations (e.g., expenses over limit, missing receipts).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags one expense for a meal that is over the per-diem limit.

tasks.description: Reject the non-compliant line item and notify the employee to correct it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent rejects the specific expense and sends an automated notification to the employee with the reason.
